short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds record data to list view, saving you the hassle of navigating to individual record pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discogs+ is a simple extension that provides extra data about records when browsing through user lists on Discogs. It fetches and displays additional information, offering immediate access to the release year, genres, and styles of each record without the need to navigate away from the page, making the browsing experience more informative and efficient.
